text: Judgment Day (2006) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) for their SmackDown! brand. It took place on May 21, 2006 at the US Airways Center in Phoenix, Arizona. It was the eighth Judgment Day event held by WWE. ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Matt Hardy defeated Simon Dean Singles match N/A 2 Paul London and Brian Kendrick defeated MNM (Joey Mercury and Johnny Nitro) (c) (with Melina) Tag team match for the WWE Tag Team Championship 13:44 3 Chris Benoit defeated Finlay by submission Singles match 21:10 4 Jillian Hall defeated Melina Singles match 7:18 5 Gregory Helms (c) defeated Super Crazy Singles match for the WWE Cruiserweight Championship 9:55 6 Mark Henry defeated Kurt Angle by countout Singles match 9:11 7 Booker T (with Sharmell) defeated Bobby Lashley Finals of the 2006 King of the Ring 9:15 8 The Great Khali (with Daivari) defeated The Undertaker Singles match 8:31 9 Rey Mysterio (c) defeated John "Bradshaw" Layfield Singles match for the World Heavyweight Championship 15:56 == King of the Ring == ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Judgment Day 2006 website Category:2006 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in Phoenix, Arizona Category:WWE Judgment Day Category:2006 in the United States Category:2000s in Phoenix
title: Judgment Day (2006)
